org.openimaj.ml.timeseries.processor

Class WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.timeseries.processor.WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeSeriesProcessor<double[],Double,DoubleTimeSeries>

    public class WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor
extends Object
implements TimeSeriesProcessor<double[],Double,DoubleTimeSeries>
    An implementation of an autoregressive model such that Xt = b*X{t-offset-window,t-offset} + c
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Perform regression s.t.
      WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor(int windowsize, int offset)
      Perform regression s.t.
      WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor(LinearRegression reg)
      Use reg as the linear regression to predict.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor

        public WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor()
        Calculate the regression from the same time series inputed

      • WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor

        public WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor(int windowsize)
        Perform regression s.t. y = Sum(w_{0-i} * x_{0-i}) + c for i from 1 to windowsize
        Parameters:
        windowsize -

      • WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor

        public WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor(int windowsize,
                                 int offset)
        Perform regression s.t. y = Sum(w_{0-i} * x_{0-i}) + c for i from 1 to windowsize
        Parameters:
        windowsize -
        offset -

      • WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor

        public WindowedLinearRegressionProcessor(LinearRegression reg)
        Use reg as the linear regression to predict. The process(DoubleTimeSeries) function simply calls LinearRegression.predict(Matrix) with the times in the series as input
        Parameters:
        reg -
